attributes.action: help, with regards to the recent credit crunch, to inject cash into construction….
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
… In September 2008 my dad received his P45 with a reason for being ‘laid off’ as "economic downturn".  He called in the job centre for his first visit in which he was told that there is no jobs available and even the advisor suggested that the construction industry has been hit hard; with masses of un-employed workers coming in each week. 

So we, as a nation, have subsidised the banks with our tax payers money, now its time for the government to help the people in working class to lower middle class that need certainty in there lives’ for there homes and families.

Please Sign with me guys to help all those who have suffered through this crunch and the billions of pounds that we, the tax payer, will have to pay back to future governments.
